meanings.definition: Fail to honor a debt or obligation.
meanings.sent1: He welched on his promise to pay back the money.
meanings.sent2: She always welches on her bets with friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to welch on its duty to catch mice.
meanings.sent4: The student welched on studying for the test, hoping for luck.
meanings.sent5: The company welched on its commitment to reduce waste, causing harm to the environment.

meanings.definition: To renege on a promise or agreement.
meanings.sent1: They welch on their agreement to share the prize money.
meanings.sent2: He welches on his promise to help with the project.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to welch on gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The politician welched on his pledge to lower taxes.
meanings.sent5: She welched on her commitment to attend the meeting, leaving her team in a tough spot.
